resources.string: Hours of operation: Sun-Thu 08:00 - 19:00 Friday 08:00 - 15:30 Saturday is closed
Address of business: 32 Hayarkon St. Tel Aviv Israel

Our flower shop is a colorful flower shop located in Tel Aviv. In the store you will find rich bouquets, table arrangements, orchids, plants and more. \'Our Flowers\' is shipping in the center. Our shop is open all week except Saturday and holidays. You are invited to enjoy the experience of buying fresh and stunning flowers for any occasion! Invited to call and visit.
